title: Prawn with egg mayonnaise open sandwich

ingredients.item: 3 hard-boiled eggs, peeled and roughly chopped
4 thin slices dark rye bread, buttered

instructions.step: Mix the chopped egg with the mustard and mayonnaise; season. Divide the egg mixture between the rye bread and top with the tomatoes and prawns. Garnish with the lemon slices and chives.
